approval_data.project_name: V-KYC recordings to be fetched for Audit requirements
approval_data.project_summary: Develop a portal/dashboard for V-KYC team leads to access and download V-KYC recordings for audit purposes.
project_goals: Provide easy access to V-KYC recordings for audit requirements.
Reduce dependency on IT for retrieving recordings.
approval_data.business_context: The V-KYC team currently relies on the IT team to provide recordings stored on the NFS server. This process is manual and time-consuming. This project aims to automate and streamline the process.

requirements.description: A portal/dashboard shall be created for accessing the V-KYC recordings.
Access to the portal shall be provided to the leads of VKYC process (TL & Process Manager).
All recordings of V-KYC shall be made available on the portal.
Recordings shall be fetched as and when required.
Recordings shall be searchable by date and month.
Recordings shall be visible if searched by LAN.
Users shall be able to upload an Excel or text file with up to 50 LAN IDs for bulk download.
The system shall trigger a backend API call to process the bulk download request.
Results of bulk download shall be displayed in a tabular format with a 'Download All' option.
The table pagination shall display only 10 records at a time.
Only 10 records at a time will be downloaded.
File upload will be csv/txt file.
Post clicking the LAN the recording download shall start.
Access to the screen will be available to very limited users (only Team leaders).

functional_requirements: Search functionality by LAN, date, and month.
Bulk download functionality based on uploaded file.
Display of recording details (User ID, Call Duration, Status, Time, Date, NFS VKYC Upload Time).
non_functional_requirements: The system should be accessible only to authorized users (Team Leads).
The system should be secure and protect the confidentiality of the recordings.
success_criteria: V-KYC team can easily access and download recordings.
Reduced dependency on IT for retrieving recordings.
constraints: Recordings are stored on the LTF ‘NFS(Network File System)’ server.
The portal should integrate with the existing infrastructure.
assumptions: The necessary APIs for accessing and downloading recordings are available.
The existing network infrastructure can support the portal.
risks: Performance issues due to large file sizes.

recommendations: Include details on the storage capacity required.
Specify the expected response time for search and download operations.

identified_gaps: Missing details on data security measures.
No mention of performance testing requirements.
recommendations_for_completion: Add security requirements to protect the recordings.
